assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This is a review of existing literature. No informed consent was required.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any studies with human participants performed by any of the authors.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any studies with animals performed by any of the authors.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study does not involve human participants and informed consent was therefore not required
